title: EP 13: The Firearms Industry Today - What You Need To Know Now
description:
Gun sales spiked during the pandemic, and it’s still up. Now is an excellent time to purchase any kind of new firearm if you are thinking of one. Steve says, “ I think now we're having people that are overstocked blow out their stocks, so there is actually a slight dip.” 

Thankfully, firearms prices seem to be not much above what they were in the pre-COVID situation.  However, the ammunitions are a bit different story. After all the disruptions, short supply, and price hikes, things seem a little stable now with 9 millimeters getting stocked in the store pretty regularly that was tight before, 40 Smith and Wesson is opening up, and much more. 

In this special episode of the Tactical Entrepreneur Podcast, Steve enlightens you on the current scenario of the Firearms industry, giving every minute to make sure what’s available and what’s not out there. If it’s going on in your mind which firearms and ammunitions you want to buy now, where to buy them, and how to find the best deals and more pieces of information, tune in to this podcast to know every ins and outs of the gun world.  

 

What you will learn:

  • What is going on behind the scenes in the firearm industry right now.
  • Why ammunitions are being sold in the market at gouging prices and how you take precautions.
  • How the presidential election between Trump and Clinton affected the prices of the ammunition market in the pre-COVID era.
  • Why Steve is pretty excited about the commence of the following year, 2022.
  • And much more.

 

Favorite Quote:

“Get your ammo, get your firearms that you need now. There’s no need to buy it up and overstock. It should remain readily available. The availability should get even better.”

- Steve Schabacker

 

How to Get Involved:

Steve Schabacker is the co-founder of Sheepdog Firearms and an entrepreneur, bestselling author, and marketer. Between his business and his content, Steve is educating firearm owners and armed professionals and setting a new standard for shops and training centers in the industry.

You can visit Sheepdog Firearms online or reach out directly to Steve at sschabacker@outlook.com.

Check out this podcast on Apple Podcasts - don’t forget to subscribe, rate, and review!
